page.title: 14Child's Weekend.Kingsbury.
page.content: {Athene.}On Saturday I cycled to Kings bury church fete with mum.I was in a folk dance team there.I wore a checked skirt and a white shirt with a red ribbon.Mrs Marks took some photos of the girls who danced.{ } {Martin.}At the weekend we were haymaking at Westport. My brother mowed 5 fields.Then he turned them twice.Meanwhile my father was baling the 15 acre field,which had been cut and turned 2 days before.I helped to put bales by hand on to the trailer. {Chris.}On Sunday I went to Wells Cathedral.It was lovely inside.A guide showed us around.On the pillars were carvings telling a story about a farmer and an apple tree.Later I bought a candle for 10p,lighted it and made a wish.At first I forgot to wish,but mum reminded me.
